title: 为嘛bbs里升级怎么慢
author: Mc李琦
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: lksstc
replies.txt_content: 水贴必举报

replies.author: Leng_Mou
replies.txt_content: 刚说你水回复，现在又水帖子，真心佩服LZ。
喜大普奔

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content:
经常看你回复专门写
我这随手一打也不知道有多少个字
这水的姿势可不正确啊

replies.author: 山大王
replies.txt_content: 应该学习楼上的水贴姿势...

replies.author: Tsui
replies.txt_content: 必定举报  hhh   你完了

replies.author: xialingjing
replies.txt_content: 然后楼主就被封号了。。

replies.author: Apple_God
replies.txt_content: 吊的很~

replies.author: robbit
replies.txt_content: 不管怎么说你舍身为我创造了一个回复的好地方

replies.author: primar-sunshine
replies.txt_content: 嫌慢就去乱水，被禁了吧

replies.author: 小攻CY
replies.txt_content: 你已经被禁言了

replies.author: 隔壁老王丶
replies.txt_content: 就是这么慢阿

replies.author: ywzl
replies.txt_content: 以为你随意水贴会被举报甚至封号

replies.author: L1597385318
replies.txt_content: 水贴必举
楼主头像被屏蔽了，哈哈

replies.author: 龙猫精神
replies.txt_content: 慢慢来，别急

replies.author: cvncvn
replies.txt_content: 像这样子水就会快好多了-w-
